full_summary:
### Supply Arrangement for Air Conditioning Unit

#### Tender Notice
* **Contract Title**: Supply of Air Conditioning Unit for Correctional Service of Canada
* **Contract Reference**: WS4510048453-Doc4535115001
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4510048453
* **Publication Date**: April 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 13, 2024 (14:00:00 EDT)
* **Amendment Number**: 5 (May 5, 2024)

#### Supply Requirements
The Correctional Service of Canada requires the delivery and installation of a 25-ton air conditioning package unit and related accessories to dehumidify the B12 kitchen at the Stony Mountain Institution.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

#### Contracting Entity
* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
	+ Contact: Jackson Myhre (jackson.myhre@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### End-User Entity
* **Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)**
	+ Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 0P9, Canada

#### How to Access the Tender Notice
Please visit [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19530938?extsite=MTk1MzA5MzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for more information. Note that the tender closing date has been amended to June 13, 2024, at 14:00:00 EDT. Please ensure all required documentation and bid submissions are received by this deadline.

* Removed unnecessary information
* Reformatted the text to improve readability
* Standardized the formatting of dates and time
* Corrected minor typos and grammatical errors
